snippets.title: Addon Detection Snippet
snippets.description: Quickly see if the addon required for your button/feature to work is enabled by removing the embross from the button if it's disabled.
snippets.author: vranimeted/blanchsb

snippets.title: Addon Detection Snippet v3
snippets.description:
Quickly see if the addon required for your button/feature to work is enabled by removing the embross from the button if it's disabled. 
*v3 has an option to use icons to indicate if the addon is enabled or disabled.  Blend file has custom icons.
snippets.author: vranimeted/blanchsb

snippets.title: Vector Split Combine
snippets.description: Use this Snippet to do some tedious vector split and combine ops. Combine unique XYZ(W) values to get a vector 3 or 4. Or you can place a unique X/Y/Z/W into a Vector 3 or Vector 4, or you can Make a Vec 3 from Vec 4 and vice versa! It's a big node but you can hide sockets not in use with Ctrl + H after connecting it up.
snippets.author: blanchsb

snippets.title: Move To Collection (S3)
snippets.description: Moves all selected objects to a named collection.

snippets.title: NewCollection
snippets.description: Node to allow you to easily create a New Linked Collection within the Active Scene.  Inputs: 1. Collection_Name - can either type or connect String to name New Collection; 2. Make_Child_of_Active_Object_Collection - Boolean to choose create a New Child Collection to Collection of Active Object.  Output: Collection_Name - passes created New Collection name on (can be different than Collection_Name Input if string already exists as Collection, e.g., New_Collection already exists and New_Collection.001 is created and passed on).
snippets.author: Ayjent

snippets.title: Exclude Layer Collection
snippets.description: Node with Boolean to Choose name of "layer collection" in Outliner to "exclude" that deactivates the specified layer collection and all children and objects from the viewport.  The Outliner is not that intuitive to utilize exclude function.  Corza should get credit for this snippet as he had the solution.
snippets.author: Ayjent/Corza

snippets.title: Return list item one by one
snippets.description: With this snippet you will be able to loop through a list and getting each item individually. So with each execution the next item is returned and at the end of the list it will start at the beginning.
snippets.author: Erasers45-Studios

snippets.title: Add Material To Object
snippets.description: With this snippet you will be able to add materials to a given object. Furthermore you can also overwrite existing material slots with your own material.
snippets.author: Erasers45-Studios

snippets.title: Load image into displacement modifier
snippets.description: With this snippet you can load an image directly into a displacement modifier of your object, just by using the filepath of your image!

snippets.title: New Resizable File Browser Window with Directory
snippets.description: This will open up a new resizable file browser window and let you set the directory. (FYI this uses the blender viewport render to create a resizable window).
snippets.author: blanchsb

snippets.title: New Resizable Window
snippets.description: Opens a new Window to a user defined size and lets you set the UI Type to one of the main blender workspaces (FYI it uses viewport render operator to do this)
snippets.author: blanchsb
